title: StakerInfoResponse
description: This structure describes the fields for staker info response message.

bond_amount.description: amount of BRO tokens bonded by staker

pending_reward.description: amount of pending rewards of staker

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
